titleStmt.title: Representation unto His Grace His Majesties High Commissioner and the right honourable the Estates of Parliament, anent the survey of the Kingdom of Scotland, and navigating the coasts and isles thereof.
titleStmt.author: Adair, John, ca. 1650-1722.

notesStmt.note: Suggested imprint and authorship from Wing.
Half-title in ms. on page [1] following text: Representation to the high court of Parliament anent the surveying of the kingdom and navigating the coasts and islands thereof. 1695.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
